entry.value: SELECT inquiry_charge_bank_id AS inquiryChargeBankId, inquiry_date AS inquiryDate, inquiry_tx_code AS inquiryTxCode, Count(DISTINCT inquiry_tx_code)AS rowSummary, Count(inquiry_tx_code) AS totalRowSummary, inquiry_id AS inquiryId, inquiry_biz_id AS inquiryBizId, inquiry_bank_code AS inquiryBankCode, inquiry_bank_account AS inquiryBankAccount, inquiry_cache_flag AS inquiryCacheFlag FROM InquiryLog WHERE inquiry_error_code IS NULL AND inquiry_date >= :startDate AND inquiry_date <= :endDate AND ('ALL' = :inquiryChargeBankId OR inquiry_charge_bank_id = :inquiryChargeBankId) GROUP BY inquiry_charge_bank_id, inquiry_date, inquiry_tx_code, inquiry_id, inquiry_biz_id, inquiry_bank_code, inquiry_bank_account, inquiry_cache_flag ORDER BY 1
SELECT DISTINCT il.inquiry_charge_bank_id AS inquiryChargeBankId FROM InquiryLog il WHERE il.inquiry_charge_bank_id IS NOT NULL AND il.inquiry_charge_bank_id != '' ORDER BY inquiry_charge_bank_id
